parts.text:
```json
{
  "application": "PIConGPU",
  "details": {
    "batch_system": "LSF (bsub)",
    "environment": {
      "TBG_queue": "batch",
      "TBG_wallTimeNoSeconds": "walltime without seconds",
      "TBG_mailSettings": "mail settings",
      "TBG_mailAddress": "email address",
      "TBG_author": "author name",
      "TBG_nameProject": "project name",
      "TBG_profile": "path to PIConGPU profile",
      "TBG_numHostedGPUPerNode": "number of GPUs per node",
      "TBG_gpusPerNode": "required GPUs per node",
      "TBG_coresPerGPU": "cores per GPU",
      "TBG_coresPerPipeInstance": "cores per pipe instance",
      "TBG_pipeInstances": "number of pipe instances",
      "TBG_nodes": "number of nodes"
    },
    "dependencies": {
      "openpmd-pipe": "openPMD data streaming tool",
      "MPI": "Message Passing Interface",
      "ADIOS2": "Adaptive Input/Output System version 2",
      "jsrun": "job submission and execution tool",
      "OMP": "OpenMP (Open Multi-Processing)",
      "bash": "Bourne-Again shell"
    },
    "resources": {
      "GPUs": "multiple GPUs",
      "CPUs": "multiple CPU cores",
      "memory": "sufficient memory for simulation data",
      "storage": "storage for input and output files",
      "network": "high-bandwidth network for communication between nodes"
    }
  }
}
```
